text: @nationalpost Come on.  Didn’t @ConradMBlack declare bankruptcy like his bum buddy @realDonaldTrump multiple times?? If I want directions in excellent English language skills @ConradMBlack is my go to.  But when it comes to economy and covid-19 stay in your lane dude.
